name: Pig Game
description: Multiplayer game where players take turns to roll a single die as many times as they wish, adding all roll results to a running total, but losing their gained score for the turn if they roll a 1.

name: Bankist App
description: Simple web application depicting login and trasaction features for general banking.

name: Mapty
description: Web Application integrated with maps to track workouts done by the user.

name: Forkify
description: Web Application to fetch recipes. Also can add and bookmark your recipes for future.

name: Natours
description: Complete Web application to book tours with functionality like authorization, checking out credit card.

name: ReactMeals
description: Static web application to order food.

name: Disney
description: UI clone for Disney's website having features like login and view movie details.

name: Slack
description: UI clone for Slack having features like login and create and chat in channel.
